import React from"react";// ðŸ‘‡ Import product images
import product1Img from"../assets/images/coffee.jpg";import product2Img from"../assets/images/sandwich.jpg";import product3Img from"../assets/images/niknaks.jpg";import product4Img from"../assets/images/Toast.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=_ref=>{let{products}=_ref;// Add safe default for products if it's undefined or empty
const safeProducts=products||[];const lowStockProducts=safeProducts.filter(product=>product.lowStockAlert);const totalProducts=safeProducts.length;// Add initial value of 0 to reduce function to prevent error with empty array
const totalValue=safeProducts.reduce((sum,product)=>sum+product.price*product.quantity,0// Initial value added here
);// ðŸ‘‡ Map product IDs/names to images
const imageMap={1:product1Img,2:product2Img,3:product3Img,4:product4Img};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Total Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:totalProducts})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Inventory Value"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["M",totalValue.toFixed(2)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Low Stock Alerts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[lowStockProducts.length," products need restocking"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Low Stock Items"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"low-stock-list",children:lowStockProducts.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"low-stock-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"low-stock-alert",children:[product.quantity," left"]})]},product.id))})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-gallery",children:safeProducts.slice(0,4).map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageMap[product.id]// âœ… use the imported image
,alt:product.name,className:"product-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["M",product.price.toFixed(2)]})]})]},product.id))})]});};export default Dashboard;
